posting_body: ['The Wyatt', '7017 South Buffalo Drive, Las Vegas, NV, 89113', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 118', 'OR Text', '118', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'Welcome home to The Wyatt', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1219 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'The Wyatt apartments in the Spring Valley section of Las Vegas, NV are situated in a sophisticated neighborhood near everything you need and want.', 'Exciting luxuries of the famous Strip are close by, and many places are open day and night.', 'Take advantage of being a local for even more entertainment opportunities Down Town.', 'With shopping, diverse restaurants, and plenty of places for relaxation, you will feel right at home and have so much fun living here.', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets Welcome Upon Approval.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Limit of 2 pets per home.', 'Maximum adult weight is 25 pounds.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Saturday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'sIGV1qgRtc']
